body_text: uber-nitpicking: if there are 100 buckets... numbered from 1-100? Because then you're saying both 70-100 and 0-19 implying there's a bucket 100 and a bucket 0, in which case the math doesn't work out (you get 31 + 20 = 51 "checked" buckets).
